016
017package squidpony.squidai.astar;
018
019/** A {@code DefaultConnection} is a {@link Connection} whose cost is 1.
020 * 
021 * @param <N> Type of node
022 * 
023 * @author davebaol */
024public class DefaultConnection<N> implements Connection<N> {
025
026        protected N fromNode;
027        protected N toNode;
028
029        public DefaultConnection (N fromNode, N toNode) {
030                this.fromNode = fromNode;
031                this.toNode = toNode;
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public float getCost () {
036                return 1f;
037        }
038
039        @Override
040        public N getFromNode () {
041                return fromNode;
042        }
043
044        @Override
045        public N getToNode () {
046                return toNode;
047        }
048
049}
